eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.jdbc

Interface JdbcConnector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PostgisDbConnector

    public interface JdbcConnector
    Interface that defines all methods to be implemented by a JDBC Database connector.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeConnection()
      Closes the connection to the database.
      java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.lang.String sql)
      Returns the result of the SQL query executed against the database.
      java.lang.Object findSingletonValue(java.lang.String sql)
      Query that fetches only the first result; Assuming that one value is only needed.
      java.lang.String getDbSystem()
      Provides the name of the DBMS (e.g., POSTGRESQL, ORACLE) to which this connection is established.
      void openConnection(JdbcConnectionPool connPool)
      Establishes a new connection taken from the pool.

    • Method Detail

      • getDbSystem

        java.lang.String getDbSystem()
        Provides the name of the DBMS (e.g., POSTGRESQL, ORACLE) to which this connection is established.
        Returns:

      • executeQuery

        java.sql.ResultSet executeQuery(java.lang.String sql)
        Returns the result of the SQL query executed against the database.
        Parameters:
        sql - An SQL command for the SELECT query.
        Returns:
        A resultset with all results of the query.

      • findSingletonValue

        java.lang.Object findSingletonValue(java.lang.String sql)
        Query that fetches only the first result; Assuming that one value is only needed.
        Parameters:
        sql - An SQL command for the SELECT query.
        Returns:
        An object representing a value (e.g., SRID, name of the primary key attribute, etc.).

      • closeConnection

        void closeConnection()
        Closes the connection to the database.

      • openConnection

        void openConnection(JdbcConnectionPool connPool)
        Establishes a new connection taken from the pool.
        Parameters:
        connPool - The pool offering available JDBC connections to the database.
